meanings.sent1: I minified the image to save space on my computer.
meanings.sent2: Developers often minify their code to improve website loading times.
meanings.sent3: The magician minified the rabbit, making it fit into a tiny hat.
meanings.sent4: She minified her worries into a single thought, freeing her mind.
meanings.sent5: The chef minified the recipe, condensing it to just a few key ingredients.

meanings.definition: To reduce (something) to the smallest possible size.
meanings.sent1: The email attachment was minified for faster sending.
meanings.sent2: The company minified their expenses to increase profits.
meanings.sent3: The students minified their project, making it fit on one page.
meanings.sent4: His words were minified to a mere whisper in the vast auditorium.
meanings.sent5: The artist minified the painting, capturing the essence in a small frame.
